data.feedback: Solid clean architecture with proper pattern adherence. Minor file path and endpoint naming issues are easily fixable during implementation.

issues.description: Router file path references non-existent lib/core/router/app_router.dart
issues.recommendation: Developers should modify lib/app.dart or create the router file - either approach works

issues.description: API endpoint '/steps/hourly' should be '/steps/hourly-peaks' to match backend

suggestions: Consider extracting router to lib/core/router/app_router.dart for cleaner separation
Theme extraction to separate files could be a follow-up story
